import { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Store } from "../Store"; import { FaPlusCircle, FaMinusCircle, FaTrashAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; const CartPage = () => { const { state, dispatch: ctxDispatch } = useContext(Store); const { cart: { cartItems }, } = state; return (

Carrito

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (
No hay nada en el carro
) : (
{cartItems.map((item) => (
  • {" "} {item.titulo}
    {item.quantity}
    ${item.precio}
))}
)}
); }; export default CartPage;
